About me

Systems and Computing Engineering student at Universidad Nacional de Colombia with interest in Software Engineering

My name is Miguel, and I'm studying Systems and Computing Engineering at Universidad Nacional de Colombia, started in 2012. I'm very glad to speak about some of my relevant academic projects and some interesting info regarding development technologies and important computer science concepts! You're very welcome!
